descripción pag: WiDi Group it's a technology consulting and open source developing group, where you can find a IT solution for every step of your production chain.
palabras clave: WiDI Group, Widi, Technology, Consulting, Solutions, Innovation, Community, Open source, Technological solutions, Customization, Technological projects
titulo: Latin America's Technological Revolution to the World
descripcion: We are a group dedicated to developing impactful solutions for all industries that still have plenty of room to innovation. We strive to help people and make their life and work experience better every day.

contacto.soporte: We offer different forms of support for a better experience.

experiencia.desarrollos_abiertos: All of our developments are open, you can make them your own.

facilidad.descripcion: Our focus on intuitive work benefits you.

apoyo.widi_cams: See how WiDicams helps with security in various environments and alleviates different job positions.

equipo.descripcion: We are all motivated to give the world the most efficient, user-friendly, and versatile free solutions.

valores.codigo_abierto: Our solutions are open source, so not only can everyone help, but all projects are free to use.
valores.hecho_para_todos: Our projects can be used by both large organizations and individuals.
valores.confiabilidad: We strive to make our solutions highly reliable and properly functional at all times.
valores.comunidad: We are part of different development communities, so you are not alone when taking advantage of us.
valores.eficiencia: We ensure that our applications always work on even low-resource systems.

Avanzada customizacion desc: Everyone can make each project their own, applying them according to their skill in their field in the best way.
Continuas mejoras desc: We never abandon projects, we ensure that their functioning is fulfilled and we keep them up to date.
Nuestras soluciones al mundo entero: Our solutions to the whole world
Nuestras soluciones al mundo entero desc: All of these are our current and completed projects, open for everyone to use.
WiDicams: Facial recognition with a focus on privacy
Contactar encantado: WiDi Group would be happy to contact you to discover the best way to help you in the technology solutions sector
Unete a la revolucion desc: Every year dozens of companies update their systems to the technological world, but not always in the most secure and efficient way. Save future problems and enjoy giant benefits without the problems that come with the new
Unete a la revolucion: Join the technology revolution with our support
